name: Animal Blox - Cute farm beasts
description:
___________________________________ 
„My kids love this game, me too!”
„Cute farm animals”
„Nice gameplay”
___________________________________

Stacking up the animals as high as you can, place them on top of each other or else your animal tower will fall down. Animal Blox is a game for young and old, but your children will love the cute farm animals. There are different game modes to play, so hours of playing fun guaranteed! Can you beat the high score of your children?

Are you the best Animal Stacker? Compete with your friends via Game Center!

Download Animal Blox now while its FREE!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Available for iPhone/iPad
Cute farm animals
Fun and addictive gameplay
100% FREE by ads
Upgrade to ad-free version
Hours of playing fun
Turn on/off the music
Great time killing game
Great game for your kids
